fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP NO. 4, 3/F., THE POTTINGER HONG KONG, NO. 74 QUEEN'S ROAD CENTRAL, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港皇后大道中74號中環‧石板街酒店3樓4號鋪

geocode_en.formatted_address: 3/F, The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 3/F, The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central, 香港

result.adr_address: 3/F, The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 3/F, The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central, Hong Kong
result.name: The Envoy

reviews.text: Had a Sunday lunch.  Interesting array of appetisers and a choice of 4 mains.  Had the sirloin and it was delicious and tender.  Service was slow for drinks and had to remind them. Their was a young waitress who needed better training in how to serve drinks - don't stretch across people and the table to give drinks,  walk around instead.

Great venue and our door space, but the service was not the best tbh. Told min spending straight away( which I understand) and told to give the table back by 7:30 ended up staying till 9:30/10 and they didn’t move us which is great . But only because we kept on purchasing drinks and going wayyyy over the min spending.  

Tried asking for a glass of water had to ask 4 times from 4 different waiter/waitress and no one seem to care except when our drink finish.they made us order fast and the drink come before the water I ordered ...

So will come back but just expect their service to not be the best (didn’t feel too welcome 😅) 

On the other hand Absolutely love their cocktails tho.
Good spot for a cocktail, tea or coffee. It’s quiet and sleek. What it lacks in atmosphere it makes up for in being a secluded oasis in the concrete jungle! A nice outdoor deck too.

Inside the award winning boutique Pottinger Hotel. Set lunch menu is reasonably priced and food is of good quality. The fish and chips is the best, juicy halibut and barracuda with crispy crust! The sirloin steak next table also appears very appetizing!  Will come again!

Amazing all-you-can-eat tasting menu. This only happens on the weekends though. The small plates was great and the mains a plus. The cocktails were delicious and the service is amazing. The rooftop experience was great. I’m definitely going back here again and recommend this place to friends who will be coming to HK later this year. Great value for what you get and worth it.

reviews.text: Had a Sunday lunch.  Interesting array of appetisers and a choice of 4 mains.  Had the sirloin and it was delicious and tender.  Service was slow for drinks and had to remind them. Their was a young waitress who needed better training in how to serve drinks - don't stretch across people and the table to give drinks,  walk around instead.

慶祝小友既生日Lunch, 搜完一輪揀到石板街酒店三樓既Envoy 👼

穿過人流不絕既皇后大道中，走上石板街錯落有致既階級🎹 轉角遇上堂皇既酒店門口🚪 搭上玫瑰金既電梯，三樓一出只有緊閉既門口😯訂咗十二點既枱，竟然12：00都未開門😑 結果12：05左右先入得☹️

穿過小門，見到Envoy 時要吧枱🍸🍹長型既空間放枱唔太密，被安排坐窗邊☀️ 小小既圓枱加上舒適既梳化🛋️ 仲有柔和燈光💡唔少得係炎夏恩物，冷氣🌬️ 環境滿分💯

Lunch menu 📑 簡潔, 頭盤🍢主菜🍽️伴石心碟🍚甜品🧁

Smoke salmon & crab roll 做頭盤，白色大碟上面，橘紅色既三文🐟 包住蟹肉絲🦀 話頭盤其實都唔大細份，少少伴碟既醬汁令味道更清爽🍃

Side dish 既truffle fries 用鐵桶上，較乾身👌 有啲失望唔係跟碟上😶

主菜既牛扒🐂, 要左medium, 有點過熟🤨 但雲石底既盤座加埋燒熟既牛扒同埋鮮紅蕃茄 🍅, 個畫面好presentable 🉐 味道👌again

半飽情況下加埋甜品🍰 ，海鹽撻🥧同蘋果批🍏 兩者都有跟雪糕上枱，最重要係成餐飯頭盤到甜品都係一致，賞心悅目既靚畫面🎨

埋單兩個人737✈️貴價就梗架喇💸生日飯還好🎉但平日去食lunch😬齋食環境同伴碟畫面🖼️味道average☑️抵唔抵自己諗⁉️
地方舒適，高級地方，價錢自然唔平，和朋友聚會，一試無防，但我自己就不會有下次，不是我杯茶...

Great venue and our door space, but the service was not the best tbh. Told min spending straight away( which I understand) and told to give the table back by 7:30 ended up staying till 9:30/10 and they didn’t move us which is great . But only because we kept on purchasing drinks and going wayyyy over the min spending.  

Tried asking for a glass of water had to ask 4 times from 4 different waiter/waitress and no one seem to care except when our drink finish.they made us order fast and the drink come before the water I ordered ...

So will come back but just expect their service to not be the best (didn’t feel too welcome 😅) 

On the other hand Absolutely love their cocktails tho.
Good spot for a cocktail, tea or coffee. It’s quiet and sleek. What it lacks in atmosphere it makes up for in being a secluded oasis in the concrete jungle! A nice outdoor deck too.

result.vicinity: 3/F, The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central

result.adr_address: 3/F The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 3/F The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central, Hong Kong
result.name: ROOM 309

reviews.text: A very special speakeasy bar. The theme is well executed throughout. The staffs are super friendly as well. They guide you through the cocktails and recommend you drinks according to your personal taste. They recently changed their menu, featuring a series of transparent drinks. One of the nicest bars around here. Will definitely go back.
What an awesome experience! Finding this place was half the fun! Their technical skill and craft deserves high praise. It is truly an art to see the bartenders at work!

When I was told you had to "sign in" and get a key card to enter Room  309, I had visions of hanging out in someone's room at The Pottinger Hotel drinking from their mini bar. 😂

However that wasn't to be and Room 309 did not disappoint. 

It's a very well thought out concept, beautifully executed.

Someone has spent a lot of time collecting some very old bottles of alcohol, along with other pieces around the bar to give it a real authentic Olde time bar. 

Staff are friendly and the drinks menu has some nice touches to it as well. 

Will definitely go back
Really creative and affordable drinks at an immaculate and fun place. Would come again.

Great speakeasy bar with a lot of character. Interesting cocktails with an “invisible menu.” We waited a bit to get in, at the restaurant on the 3rd floor. Our favorite speakeasy in Hong Kong for sure!

result.vicinity: 3/F The Pottinger Hong Kong, 74 Queen's Road Central, Central

result.name: ROOM 309

reviews.text: A very special speakeasy bar. The theme is well executed throughout. The staffs are super friendly as well. They guide you through the cocktails and recommend you drinks according to your personal taste. They recently changed their menu, featuring a series of transparent drinks. One of the nicest bars around here. Will definitely go back.

位置真的很難找，不過非常值得
不論裝潢、酒單設計、調酒與服務都沒得挑剔
Bartender 很親切，專業又願意跟客人分享知識的棒～

호텔 룸 컨셉의 재밌는 바였습니다. 
칵테일을 반투명하게 만들어 주는점이 특이했는데 맛보단 컨셉에 더 점수를 주고 싶습니다.
공간이 넓지 않아서 시끄럽지 않았고 소음이 적당해서 이야기 하기에 좋다고 생각했습니다.
세련된 분위기와 술과 함께 올리브를 제공하는 점도 마음에 들었습니다.
What an awesome experience! Finding this place was half the fun! Their technical skill and craft deserves high praise. It is truly an art to see the bartenders at work!

When I was told you had to "sign in" and get a key card to enter Room  309, I had visions of hanging out in someone's room at The Pottinger Hotel drinking from their mini bar. 😂

However that wasn't to be and Room 309 did not disappoint. 

It's a very well thought out concept, beautifully executed.

Someone has spent a lot of time collecting some very old bottles of alcohol, along with other pieces around the bar to give it a real authentic Olde time bar. 

Staff are friendly and the drinks menu has some nice touches to it as well. 

Will definitely go back
